FreeCamera

Free Camera and CameraChanger are two simple tools that I created for one of my projects. Free camera allows to move camera everywhere we want just like noclip and Camera changer is a tool that allows you to add several cameras to the scene and move between them during the game.

The most important features of these tools are simplicity and the number of possible applications in various projects.

Tools available on the platform:
